Bioinstrumentation Computation Software

Laser Microphone (Laser Vibrometry)

← Back to Projects

Biophotonics Microcontrollers Signal Processing Interferometry Infrared Laser

Overview

Reconstructing photoacoustic signals in tissue phantom by observing interferometry changes from a reflected laser beam on a vibrating surface. Senior project for imaging inside tissue using light and sound.

Functional Specification
